faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.subtitle: Have questions? Here are some of the most frequently asked questions and their answers

q1.question: How can I book a tourist trip?
q1.answer: You can easily book your trip through our website or contact us directly via phone or email. Our team is ready to help you choose the right destination and organize all the details.

q2.question: What payment methods are available?
q2.answer: We offer several secure payment methods including credit cards (Visa, Mastercard), bank transfer, and cash on delivery in some cases.

q3.question: Can I cancel or modify my booking?
q3.answer: Yes, you can cancel or modify your booking according to our cancellation policy. Please review the booking terms or contact our support team for assistance.

q4.question: Do you offer group or family packages?
q4.answer: Absolutely! We offer special packages for groups and families at competitive prices. Contact us to get a customized offer that suits your needs.
